Title: Directs the commissioner of health to establish demonstration projects providing for equity investment in the operation of residential health care facilities
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to establish demonstration projects providing for equity investment in the operation of residential health care facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง2801-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing the commissioner of health to establish demonstration projects authorizing equity investment in the operation of residential health care facilities
